```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r cars}
summary(cars)
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(cars, aes(x = speed, y = dist)) +
  geom_smooth() +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal()
```
